attributes.action: include all roads and traffic into the envioroment protection act so all polutants can be bought to task
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i live quite close to the m6.on levels it is about the same hight as my house.the noise is constant.the polution is constant.so in my ignorance i emailed the epa only to be told that roads are not covered by the act.so i emailed the highways and asked for a fence  to try to keep the noise and polution down.they have no plans for either.so i thought try this let you all know that roads are outside the epa.
